original_text: Now the man who had been healed did not know who it was, for Jesus had withdrawn, as there was a crowd in the place.
korean_text: 고침을 받은 사람은 그가 누구인지 알지 못하니 이는 거기 사람이 많으므로 예수께서 이미 피하셨음이라

sentences.original_text: Now the man who had been healed
did not know who it was
as there was a crowd in the place
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에 사람들이 많이 모여 있었기 때문이다
